title.rendered: BMW Z3 Price, Images, Mileage, Reviews, Specs

content.rendered:
BMW Z3 specs & features

BMW Z3 price list (Variants)

The BMW Z3 has 1 Petrol Engine on offer. The Petrol engine is 2979 cc . It is available with Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the Z3 has a mileage of 10.37 kmpl. The Z3 is a 2 seater 6 cylinder car and has length of 4239mm, width of 1790mm and a wheelbase of 2496mm.

Questions & answers

excerpt.rendered: BMW Z3 specs & features Engine 2979 cc Power 306 bhp Torque 400 Nm Transmission Automatic Top Speed 250km/hr kmph Drive Type RWD BMW Z3
